title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.27 - Passenger restraints
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.27 - Passenger restraints

State Regulations

No person shall operate a vehicle on a terminal highway
unless in full compliance with section 1229-c of the New York State Vehicle and

Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
